tasks.name: Visual Task
tasks.definition: Participants were exposed to a visual stimulus consisting of a radial blue/yellow checkerboard reversing at 7 Hz during the 'ON' state. During the 'OFF' state, participants focused on a cross at the center of the screen. The experiment followed a two-state (OFF, ON) × 3 block design with a duration of 40 s for each block.
